content: चरित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [चर् कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Wandered or roamed over, gone. {@--2@} Performed, practised. {@--3@} Attained. {@--4@} Known. {@--5@} Offered; <ls>Ś. 4. 21.</ls> {@--6@} Acted, behaved; <ls>Ś. 5. 16.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Going, moving, course. {@--2@} Acting, doing, practice, behaviour, acts, deeds; उदारचरितानां <ls>H. 1. 70</ls>; सर्वं खलस्य चरितं मशकः करोति <ls n="H.">1. 81.</ls> {@--3@} Life, biography, adventures, history,; उत्तरं रामचरितं तत्प्रणीतं प्रयुज्यते <ls>U. 1. 2</ls>; दिवौकसरत्वच्चरितं लिखंति <ls>Ś. 7. 5</ls>; so दशकुमारचरितं &c. {@--4@} Nature. {@--5@} Fixed law, due or proper observance.
